about_the_game:
Fair and Square
Prepare for the ultimate test of precision, reflexes, and strategy in Fair and Square, a fast-paced bullet hell platformer roguelike where every move matters, and every decision shapes your journey.

Ready?

  • Square-Based Action: Navigate vibrant arenas where everything – from characters to enemies to bullets – is cleverly designed around squares.

  • Wave-Based Chaos: Survive increasingly challenging waves of enemies, each more relentless than the last. Adapt quickly or face defeat!

  • Strategic Upgrades: Between waves, visit the shop to buy, upgrade, and customize skills that will define your playstyle. Will you focus on firepower, mobility, or defense?

  • Boss Battles: Face off against towering square bosses with unique mechanics and escalating difficulty. Only the sharpest skills will see you through to the final showdown.

  • Roguelike Replayability: No two runs are ever the same. Experiment with different builds and strategies to see how far you can push your limits.

Are you ready to conquer the chaos and prove yourself fair and square? Play now and carve your name in the annals of square greatness!

Survive relentless enemy waves, upgrade your skills in the shop, and face epic bosses. Customize your playstyle, adapt on the fly, and prove your mastery in this chaotic challenge!
